name: 02-two-servers
description: * Using the previous example as a guide, create an app that has two web servers. * One that listens on port 7000 and one that listens on port 7500. * The one listening on port 7000 will always tell the user something good about themselves. * The one listening on 7500 will always tell the user something bad about themselves. * Make sure you create a Github repo and commit this code!
